attributes.action: Ex-Cllr Wendy M.Harbon & WheelchairCharlie39 + JLP our new Multi-disability Independent Assistance Dog/Puppy In Training.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are asking the General Public, Military and Civilian Charities / Associations, plus all politician's and political parties, to support the Lucky Palmer MIAD (our old dog) APPEAL To The British Government asking for a agreement to provide Civilian Assistance Dogs benefits paid by DWP, also Military Assistance Dogs benefits paid by MoD, to all Assistance Dog Charities and/or user's, to help with the cost of these animals over their working lives and training, who provide life saving care to their disabled user's/owner's in the UK.

rejection.details: Please re-write your petition title and submit again.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
